name: HymnsRadio
0:
”Alexa, play hymns radio”
”Alexa, open hymns radio”
”Alexa, stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hymns radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hymns Radio is an online radio station whose goal is to provide listeners with continuous access to hymns that are rich in Biblical truth, high quality, and enjoyable. The Hymns Radio skill requires an Echo Dot or other Alexa-enabled device capable of playing streaming audio. As with the Hymns Radio website and app, there is no functionality for choosing a song, but only play and stop. 

The Hymns Radio skill will allow the user to start the music stream at Hymns Radio by saying "Alexa, play hymns radio".
To stop the music stream, the user can say "Alexa, stop". For more information about Hymns Radio, please visit hymnsradio.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
